Methods

WithChild<TContainer, TChild>(TContainer, TChild)

Set a specified child on container.

public static TContainer WithChild<TContainer, TChild>(this TContainer container, TChild child) where TContainer : IContainerCollection<TChild> where TChild : Drawable

Parameters

container TContainer

The container that will have a child set.

child TChild

The child that should be set to the container.

Returns

TContainer

The given container.

Type Parameters

TContainer

The container type.

TChild

The type of children contained by container.

WithChildren<TContainer, TChild>(TContainer, IEnumerable<TChild>)

Set specified children on container.

public static TContainer WithChildren<TContainer, TChild>(this TContainer container, IEnumerable<TChild> children) where TContainer : IContainerCollection<TChild> where TChild : Drawable

Parameters

container TContainer

The container that will have children set.

children IEnumerable<TChild>

The children that should be set to the container.

Returns

TContainer

The given container.

Type Parameters

TContainer

The container type.

TChild

The type of children contained by container.

Wrap<TContainer, TChild>(TContainer, TChild)

Wraps the given drawable with the given container such that the container can be used instead of the drawable without affecting the layout. The container must not contain any children before wrapping.

public static TContainer Wrap<TContainer, TChild>(this TContainer container, TChild drawable) where TContainer : Container<TChild> where TChild : Drawable

Parameters

container TContainer

The container that should wrap the given drawable.

drawable TChild

The drawable that should be wrapped by the given container.

Returns

TContainer

The given container.

Type Parameters

TContainer

The type of the container.

TChild

The type of the children of container.
